name: file-axiom
description: A specialized sidecar for AI Agents. Empowers agents to find, move, and rename files using deterministic APIs instead of probabilistic script generation. Zero hallucinations, zero broken imports.

chatParticipants.name: axiom
chatParticipants.description: Deterministic file operations with atomic import updates for AI Agents.

commands.name: find
commands.description: Find files matching a glob pattern

commands.name: rename
commands.description: Rename a file and update all imports/references

commands.name: list
commands.description: List all files inside a specific folder

commands.name: duplicate
commands.description: Copy a file or folder to a new location

commands.name: move
commands.description: Move a file to a different directory with import updates

commands.name: delete
commands.description: Delete a file safely (moves to system trash)

commands.name: info
commands.description: Get technical metadata (size, dates, lines) for a file

scripts.compile: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile-tests && pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
